instruction: Propose an idea for an online game.
output: A multiplayer game where you and your teammates have to work together to explore a virtual universe. In the game, players take on the roles of space pilots and they must use their problem-solving and communication skills to complete missions and explore mysterious worlds. The game will also have an economy system where currency can be earned and spent to buy equipment, upgrades, and other items. The game could also include compelling storylines, an array of diverse characters to interact with, and puzzles to solve.
